name: Strandead (Sam)
description:
STRANDEAD is a first person text-based exploration 3D game. 

Follow Saige through her journey in finding the way home to Tapioca Street. Explore the streets, talk to people and unlock areas.

FEATURES

  • 5 Game Endings
  • Exploration of choice, storytelling and reality.
  • Multiple possibilities based on the player’s choices
